data.thought: S29|H|S27|Observatory Phenotype E2: 'Live System Dashboard'. Notebook continuously: (1) Polls system metrics (2) Runs health checks in containers (3) Queries logs. Streams everything to Observatory as real-time dashboard. Thoughtbox: anomaly detection, trend analysis, predictive alerts. Observable: metrics graphs, health indicators, AI annotations. Diff from Grafana: embedded reasoning, natural language insights, proactive recommendations. User sees: system state + AI interpretation.
